title: About the Hextech Crafting
body: I really like it, and how it rewards skillful play. My only problem is... lately, about 1 in 3 times when i click on it, my lol client just closes it out completely. I was wondering if that only happens to me, and if there is a way for me to fix it.

replies.body: If I understand correctly, is your client simply closing whenever you run hextech crafting?  Is there a specific point that this is happening, such when you select a shard or try to craft something?  Are you receiving any error messages?  Any additional information can help us pinpoint your issue a little better.  Looking forward to your reply and helping out!
Yupp this has started to happen to me too, just clicking on hextech randomly and boom clients dies, and process is still running.

I haven't heard of this issue happening before, but it sounds like the client is trying to download assets and communicate with your network and is losing connection.  When you have some time, please go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this.  Let me know the results!
It's a bug that came with this patch, I experienced it only once, but players who were experiencing it consistently have reported that a repair solved the issue.

I've actually had this happen too, so hopefully it's not an issue if I chime in.

In my experiences, it's when you click the button that opens the hextech crafting interface, and then the client just disappears, and leaves no obvious trace (no icon on the taskbar for example). That said, the program does seem to still be running, in that if you go to open league again it gives a dialogue box that says theres already an instance of the client running.

I haven't been able to pinpoint any particular activities that lead up to it, and often opening hextech crafting works fine. It just seems that after I've bene playing for awhile and happen to go check to see if I have 3 fragments yet or something like that, the client choke as described above.
Same thing just happened to me. Was in shop, went back to Home page, Clicked on hextech crafting, was loading, Instant close.
What do you mean by "my lol client just closes it out completely", does your client crash or...?
